# File.IsValidFileName method

Determines whether *name* is a valid name for a file.

```csharp
public static bool IsValidFileName(string name)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | Filename to check. |

## Return Value

true if *name* is a valid file name; otherwise, false.
